Package org.parboiled.support

Class Summary
Characters An immutable, set-like aggregation of (relatively few) characters that allows for an inverted semantic (all chars except these few) and proper treatment of the special characters defined in Chars.
Chars Defines special meaning characters that are mapped to reserved Unicode non-characters (guaranteed to never actually denote a real unicode char).
Checks  
InputBuffer Simple immutable wrapper around a char[] buffer providing basic access methods.
InputLocation Immutable value container identifying a certain position in an InputBuffer.
LabelPrefixPredicate<V>  
LeafNodeFilter<V> A simple node filter for use with ParseTreeUtils.printNodeTree(ParsingResult, org.parboiled.common.Function).
NodeFormatter<V> A simple Formatter that provides String representation for parse tree nodes.
ParseError Immutable class holding all values describing a certain error encountered during a parsing run.
ParseTreeUtils General utility methods for operating on parse trees.
ParsingResult<V> A simple container for encapsulating the result of a parsing run.
Reference<T> A simple container holding a reference to another object.
